name: Running in the 70's(Pre Gamer Slam)
description:
Story:

In Running in the 70's, you play as a mercenary and your next mission is to investigate the Mayor of Bracuapícia, as he is apparently plotting against the Great Entrepreneurs that now control the city.

Game:
A level with 2 types of obstacles for you to interact with.

Development Notes: 
This was the first game I worked on and it went pretty smooth overall, i also did not work in the lead of this project, but it gave me the experience to lead all of the following games.
